titles.title: To amend provisions of title 46, United States Code, popularly known as the Death on the High Seas Act to limit application of those provisions to maritime accidents, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
7/11/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Death on the High Seas Act to make provisions concerning commercial aviation accidents also applicable to maritime accidents.
